New Records: Corey Seager has the most World Series home runs by a shortstop with three
Corey Seager has 19 career postseason home runs, second among shortstops, trailing Derek Jeter by one
Key Match Events: Corey Seager and Marcus Semien each homered early in an 11-7 rout of the Arizona Diamondbacks in Game 4
Texas improved to 10-0 on the road this postseason and moved within one win of the first title in the 63-season history of a franchise
Pre-Game Insights: The Rangers are favorites to win the World Series at -1700 odds, according to FanDuel Sportsbook
Post-Match Reflections: Nathan Eovaldi tries to close out the third all-wild card World Series on Wednesday night against Zac Gallen in a rematch of Game 1 starters
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rangers slugger Adolis García and pitcher Max Scherzer will miss the rest of the World Series after getting hurt in Game 3
Others: The Rangers and Diamondbacks combined for three errorless games to start this year’s World Series, the first time that’s happened
Fears about dismal ratings for this year’s World Series are becoming a reality
Ketel Marte has the longest hitting streak in postseason history at 20 games
Rangers manager Bruce Bochy is trying for his fourth World Series title after winning with San Francisco in 2010, 2012 and 2014
